::: callout-tip
## Objective

In this session, we will learn/review the basics of linear regression.
:::

## Materials

## Session Outline

1.  Introduction: estimating a production function
1.  Course logistics
1.  Example: the link between the level of education and earnings
1.  Exercise (optional)
1.  Mathematical derivation of the OLS estimator

## Additional Resources

-   [Seeing Theory](https://seeing-theory.brown.edu/) provides a nice introduction to probability and statistics based on interactive web applications
-   The material from your L3 econometrics class
-   [Chapter 4 of *The Effect*](https://theeffectbook.net/ch-DescribingRelationships.html)
-   [Chapter 3 of Sciences Po's *Introduction to Econometrics with R*](https://scpoecon.github.io/ScPoEconometrics/linreg.html)
